title: Ultraboost 1.0 Nebraska
subtitle: Sportswear
description:
Bring your Cornhuskers spirit along for the ride every time you lace up in these Ultraboost running shoes. Comfy BOOST cushioning keeps you energized from start to finish, and adidas PRIMEKNIT flexes and supports the foot with every step. Attach the webbing strips to your laces and show your team pride.

Featured above and throughout the campaign is Nicklin Hames; Nicklin is a senior Nebraska Cornhusker volleyball player from Maryville, TN, where she played for an adidas-sponsored club volleyball program. As an NU team captain, she’s led her team to two national championship matches. Nicklin has received All-American recognition each year she’s been at Nebraska, and was honored as Most Outstanding Player in 2021. For the 2023 season, she plans to stay on as a graduate assistant, beginning her coaching career.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT upper; Interchangeable webbing strips; BOOST midsole; Torsion System; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Scarlet / Core Black; Product code: HQ5873
colors: Cloud White / Team Maroon / Team Colleg Gold

title: Samba FC Bayern Shoes
subtitle: Originals
description: Watching your soccer club win ten consecutive titles adds a dash of confidence to your stride. Dressed in FC Bayern's traditional home colors and flashing a club badge on the tongue, these adidas Samba shoes show who you follow. The smooth leather upper has all the signature details of the beloved Samba, like a T-toe and serrated 3-Stripes. Lace them up to stand tall with Bavaria's finest.
details: Lace closure; Leather upper; Synthetic lining; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Team Power Red 2 / Core Black / Gum; Product code: HQ7031
colors: Clear Blue / Cloud White / Tactile Blue

title: Grand Court Alpha Shoes
subtitle: Men's Essentials
description:
Sometimes classic is the best answer for the future. These adidas tennis-inspired sneakers ground you in a modern classic while you explore what makes you you. Wear them all day while you kick it with your friends.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Leather upper; Molded tongue; Textile lining; Cloudfoam Comfort sockliner; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Core Black / Blue Rush; Product code: GY8029

subtitle: Children Sportswear

title: Adilette Bonega Slides
subtitle: Women's Originals
description: Casual. But also bold. These adidas slides take your style to new heights with a bold platform sole. And because you are too unique to be defined by style conventions, they give you endless options for self-expression. Dress them up, or down. You can make them your own.
details: Slip-on; Synthetic bandage upper; Synthetic lining; Platform rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Blue Rush / Cloud White / Pulse Magenta; Product code: GX9480

title: Ultraboost DNA XXII Shoes
subtitle: Sportswear
description:
Enjoy the comfort of adidas Ultraboost through every moment of your action-filled days. These running shoes have hundreds of BOOST capsules that are fused together for incredible energy return and reliable cushioning. The trail-ready shoes have leather-like overlays that support the foot and maximize durability. A toothy rubber outsole grips on rugged paths and slippery surfaces. Lace up for confidence, stride after stride.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

title: Jeremy Scott Forum 84 Low Mono Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description: Whimsical ideas and bright colors are the Jeremy Scott signature, and they're splashed all over these adidas Forum shoes. Part of an ongoing collaboration, the designer gives a fresh new look to a classic silhouette that got its start on the B-ball courts. Premium white leather is the perfect canvas for his creativity and yours.
details: Lace closure with hook-and-loop strap; Leather upper; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Lace accessories; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Core Black; Product code: GX9668

title: Samba ADV RYR Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description: Celebrating one of skateboarding's favorite style icons, Gino Iannucci. The Samba ADV Respect Your Roots shoes were designed by the man himself with an ultra-premium leather upper and molded tongue for that perfect sock-like fit. Redesigned for skateboarding, the Samba ADV is more durable, with a better fit for skateboarding but remains true to the original icon.
details: Lace closure; Premium leather upper; Adituff toe; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Blue Bird; Product code: GY6941

description:
The future of basketball is all about speed, and Donovan Mitchell is as fast as they come. The newest signature shoes from Mitchell and adidas Basketball are built specifically to elevate the on-court movements of one of the game's fastest, most dynamic scorers. Ultralight Lightstrike teams up with a LIGHTLOCK upper for a snug fit and a propulsion system that won't weigh you down. A totally unique rubber outsole is designed to generate traction where you need it most, so every hard-charging cut and head fake has total support. Mitchell's Spida logo and signature graphics provide the finishing touch.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

colors: Vivid Red / Core Black / Team Victory Red

They offer the pedal-gripping power of a Stealth® Phantom™ Dotty rubber outsole along with everyday walking comfort and style. A canvas upper and traditional lacing give them a casual look, so you can ride to work, school or around town without looking like you just stepped off your bike.

description:
Grab the heel tab on these infants' adidas running shoes, slide your baby's feet inside and watch their face light up with glee. The grippy outsole creates a fun trail of LEGO® tracks behind them. Classic LEGO® color combos add cool style and more delight for little eyes.

description: Long summer days are meant to be spent on the course. Walk your rounds without ever thinking about your feet in the adidas Solarmotion spikeless golf shoes. A hybrid BOOST and Lightstrike midsole combines energy return with a super-light feel to keep you feeling fresh and focused through a full 18 holes and beyond. The secure, grounded feel of the Gripmore outsole lets you swing with confidence and transition to the clubhouse with ease. A breathable mesh upper keeps the air flowing and resists wet conditions for comfort that lets you focus on the game.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Waterproof film over textile upper; Slow resilient sockliner; Lightstrike cushioning; BOOST in heel; Gripmore® Traxion spikeless outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Dark Silver Metallic / Core Black; Product code: GX6425

description:
Go far, and feel good doing it. Get the most out of your long runs with these adidas running shoes designed for optimal support. The dual-density midsole provides a soft, cushioned landing, with plenty of rocker to propel you forward. Firmer foam in the heel protects and stabilizes the foot, while an internal wrap gives a locked-in feel. The engineered mesh upper combines targeted stability zones with maximum breathability that feels good from start to finish.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

description: Controlling the court isn't always enough in indoor sports. So when you need to dominate the air too, pull on these adidas Crazyflight shoes. The lightweight mesh upper has a mid-cut design and TPU-reinforced midfoot so you stay supported when you're back on the ground.

description: Whatever your indoor sport, boss the court. These lightweight adidas Forcebounce shoes keep you stable and in control thanks to the internal supports and external overlays on their tough ripstop upper. description:
Enjoy the ageless comfort of a classic clog with a modern twist when you wear the adidas by Stella McCartney Clogs. Easy to slip and off, the Clog is the ideal shoe for when you're out and about. Made with animal-free ingredients to offer you a vegan option.

These clogs are a high-fashion slipper that brings streetwear aesthetics to your everyday looks.

These Adistar shoes are part of the Refuel series, a homage to the local foods runners eat post-marathon. They come in colorways inspired by the pizzerias of New York City and the döner kebab shops of Berlin. Wear them for distances of anywhere from 5K to 100K. The adidas REPETITOR+ foam midsole supports each heel strike to help guide the foot through smooth transitions. Additional supports are integrated into the upper for a locked-in feel as you train or race.

True to the NMD legacy, these shoes combine cutting-edge technology with city-ready style. Your young explorer will have soft BOOST cushioning under their feet and 3-Stripes up top. description: A champion of the tennis courts during the '70s and a style icon today, no sneaker is more effortlessly cool than the adidas Stan Smith. Their simplicity has withstood the test of time, and this pair continues that legacy with all the signature details. Bringing a new dimension to the design, the shoes are done with a glazed, dip-dye triple-black execution inspired by Chinese porcelain. A hand-drawn flower print shines through the upper. While the shoes are done in shades of black, the sockliner bursts with blue flowers.
details: Lace closure; Synthetic upper; Synthetic lining; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Supplier Colour / Supplier Colour / Carbon; Product code: IE6635

description: Seventeen years of running data informed the creation of these versatile running shoes. Designers and runners collaborated throughout the digital design process to minimize the need for traditional prototyping. They created shoes with a foot-hugging adidas PRIMEKNIT upper that wraps the foot for a supported feel. You'll ride atop an adidas 4D latticed midsole that cushions every step for a smooth and responsive ride.

description: Dennis Busenitz knows detail and the Busenitz Vulc II is a testament to his craft and unique approach to skateboarding and design. The Busenitz Vulc II takes his design insights and specifications and creates a streamlined version of his classic pro model. Featuring the staple feel and fit the Busenitz franchise was founded on, the Dennis vulc version features a slimmed-down suede construction with Adituff toe reinforcement, molded Adiprene sockliner, Geofit collar and Geoflex outsole for grip and control. Mixing abrasion-resistant technology for skateboarding and a vulcanized construction, the Busenitz Vulc II provides lightweight durability and boardfeel for modern skateboarding.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Suede upper with Geofit padded collar; Abrasion-resistant Adituff toe; Molded heel clip; Adiprene cushioning; Vulcanized Geoflex outsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Collegiate Navy / Blue Bird; Product code: GY6906

A play on transparency, these adidas NMD_V3 Shoes continue to build on the NMD franchise's signature expression of tactical tech. The other thing to know is that it's partially encapsulated in TPU, met by TPU heel plugs that signal that these are in fact NMD sneakers. 

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

description:
Swerve. Control. Power. adidas Predator has all angles covered. Hit the pitch and find your edge in these firm ground soccer cleats. Deployed across their low-cut coated textile upper, grippy Control Zone print assists you with every touch of the ball. Underneath, an eye-catching, angular TPU outsole ensures you stay in charge on dry natural grass.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Asymmetrical lace closure; Control Zone coated textile upper; Low-cut collar; Textile lining; TPU firm ground outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Solar Yellow / Power Blue; Product code: GW0995

description: Run smooth with these adidas shoes, created using state-of-the-art 3D printing technology, with incredible smoothness, guiding your strides for a more fluid run. The 4DFWD heel is angled to increase impact absorption. Working together with the EVA midsole, this unique design translates into a smooth heel transition at the moment of touchdown while the 3 layered upper is engineered for seamless stretchable support for lateral and linear movements. A rubber outsole provides superb traction for a confident stride. Made in part with recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Lace closure; Engineered mesh upper; Textile lining; 3D-printed 4DFWD midsole; Imported; Product color: Shadow Navy / Matt Purple Met. / Almost Blue; Product code: GY8412

description: The pair you always want right by the front door. These adidas wide-fit running shoes are a workhorse, daily training–style. They give you a guided feel throughout the entire gait cycle, plus the energy you need to tackle your goals. BOOST offers incredible energy return with every step, and the Linear Energy Push System is behind the controlled landings and propulsive toe-offs.

description:
Whatever you're lifting, these adidas weightlifting shoes ensure you do it in comfort. Lightweight but tough, their canvas upper includes open-mesh inserts for added breathability. A combination of strap and laces secures the midfoot, and a midsole wedge adds rock-solid stability under heavy loads. Underneath, a rubber outsole grips the mat to keep you planted.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Wear whatever you want as you do all of your everyday deeds in style and comfort in these adidas shoes. The iconic 3-Stripes on the synthetic leather upper, plus a rubber cupsole underneath, create a heritage vibe.

description:
Our little ones are the future. And they'll get there their own way, in their own time. But there's no reason these adidas Ozelia Shoes can't help transport them. These sneakers are packed with soft, plush cushioning to help toddlers walk (or crawl, or wobble) their path comfortably.

This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

colors: Clear Pink / Core Black / Clear Pink

description:
Stand strong for your convictions. Designed in collaboration with the Marimekko design house, these running shoes have a boldly colored print that celebrates female empowerment. BOOST delivers incredible energy return and instant comfort while an adidas PRIMEKNIT upper wraps the foot with a supportive fit. The Stretchweb outsole with Continental™ Rubber flexes naturally and provides superior traction on slick or slanting surfaces. 

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT textile upper; BOOST midsole; Textile lining; Weight: 11.6 ounces; Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel :22 mm / forefoot: 12 mm); Stretchweb outsole with Continental™ Rubber; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Pearl Citrine; Product code: GW8567
